TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HelpNavigator extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定常數，表示要顯示說明檔的哪些項目。

span.span: Specifies constants indicating which elements of the Help file to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別由和類別提供的存取權的說明檔的特定項目。This enumeration is used by the and classes to provide access to specific elements of a Help file. 例如，當搭配元件，可提供 F1 說明、 TopicId 或主題的值可指定以開啟 [說明] 5d; 內容特定主題。For example, when used with the component that provides F1 Help, the TopicId or Topic value could be specified to open Help to a context-specific topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示具有可用互動 mspaint.chm 說明檔的三個按鈕的表單。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕可顯示**索引** 索引標籤的說明檔。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明**按鈕中選取的值為基礎的說明檔中會顯示內容**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字**按鈕會顯示內容中指定的關鍵字為基礎之說明檔**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword specified in the **Keyword** text box. 比方說，顯示 [橢圓形說明畫面索引值，請選取中的 KeywordIndex 值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**] 文字方塊中，然後按一下 [**顯示說明**] 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the KeywordIndex value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示關鍵字的 < 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例會使用方法，以顯示不同的說明索引標籤和說明主題和方法，以顯示 [說明] 索引。The example uses the method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the method to display the Help index. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator AssociateIndex = int32(-2147483643)

summary.span: 說明檔會開啟指定主題的第一個字母之索引項目。

span.span: The Help file opens to the index entry for the first letter of a specified topic.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Find = int32(-2147483644)

summary.span: 說明檔會開啟搜尋頁面。

span.span: The Help file opens to the search page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Index = int32(-2147483645)

span.span: The Help file opens to the index.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator KeywordIndex = int32(-2147483642)

summary.span: 開啟含指定索引項目的主題之說明檔 (如果存在的話)，否則顯示最接近指定關鍵字的索引項目。

span.span: The Help file opens to the topic with the specified index entry, if one exists; otherwise, the index entry closest to the specified keyword is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator TableOfContents = int32(-2147483646)

span.span: The Help file opens to the table of contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Topic = int32(-2147483647)

summary.span: 說明檔會開啟指定的主題 (若該主題存在的話)。

span.span: The Help file opens to a specified topic, if the topic exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator TopicId = int32(-2147483641)

summary.span: 說明檔會開啟數字主題識別項所表示的主題。

span.span: The Help file opens to a topic indicated by a numeric topic identifier.
